column4: has anyone here installed ubuntu using an encrypted partition ?
Do you mean use the encrypt hard drive feature in the alt cd?
I've done it. You have to use the entire disk, I believe.
well i installed it on my macbook and didnt use the entire disk
but ive got a problem. i had to remove the boot arguements splash and quiet because if either one was used the screen went black and hung.
ever since i removed those arguments it boots but without a loading gui
So when you boot up, do you get GDM?
i do see the text login
I'm so sorry. but I really got to go now.
